letters.description: Acknowledge and validate the griever's unique experience and emotions without judgment.
Facilitate exploration of the various aspects of the loss, including tangible and intangible elements.
Evaluate the client's coping mechanisms, support systems, and potential for complicated grief.
Identify and cultivate sources of meaning, purpose, and resilience in the face of loss.
Guide the client towards integrating the loss into their life narrative and finding a path forward with continued growth.
